text: After months of suspense, the Bad Bunny and Drake collaboration has finally arrived. Presumably taken from the Puerto Rican trap sensation's imminently expected and highly anticipated full - length debut La Nueva Religión, ` ` MIA'' teams him with the Canadian hip - hop superstar, something teased on social media as far back as this past January. A co - release through OVO Sound and Rimas Entertainment, two imprints affiliated with Warner Bros., the dembow - driven pop single notably showcases both artists performing entirely in Spanish. Latin music lovers and Drizzy stans alike will recall this isn't the first time that Drake has featured en español on a Spanish - language act's single. In 2013, he appeared on bachata star Romeo
